credit_line: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
title: Printer's Proof for Lumium Limited Letterhead
provenance: Marion Dorn Kauffer, 40 Central Park South, New York, NY
description:
At left, an abstract figure composed of geometric forms, a triangular head and  blue and red dots for hands, stands slightly to the left and above the company name and address. Imprinted text, in silver, blue and red:"LUMIUM / LTD"; in smaller red letters, right:"BRETTENHAM HOUSE / STRAND LONDON WC2".Design shows a printer's proof for Kauffer letterhead. 

Matted with 1963-39-688, 689, 690a,b.
name: Print
